verses.esv: 5 For there is one God, and there is one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
verses.kjv: 5 For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
verses.niv: 5 For there is one God and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,

verses.esv:
6   Thus says the LORD, the King of Israel
    and his Redeemer, the LORD of hosts:
  “I am the first and I am the last;
    besides me there is no god.
verses.kjv: 6 Thus saith the LORD the King of Israel, and his redeemer the LORD of hosts; I am the first, and I am the last; and beside me there is no God.
verses.niv: 6 "This is what the LORD says- Israel's King and Redeemer, the LORD Almighty: I am the first and I am the last; apart from me there is no God.

verses.esv:
11   I, I am the LORD,
    and besides me there is no savior.
verses.kjv: 11 I, even I, am the LORD; and beside me there is no saviour.
verses.niv: 11 I, even I, am the LORD, and apart from me there is no savior.

verses.esv: 19 You believe that God is one; you do well. Even the demons believe—and shudder!
verses.kjv: 19 Thou believest that there is one God; thou doest well: the devils also believe, and tremble.
verses.niv: 19 You believe that there is one God. Good! Even the demons believe that--and shudder.

verses.esv: 6 yet for us there is one God, the Father, from whom are all things and for whom we exist, and one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom are all things and through whom we exist.
verses.kjv: 6 But to us there is but one God, the Father, of whom are all things, and we in him; and one Lord Jesus Christ, by whom are all things, and we by him.
verses.niv: 6 yet for us there is but one God, the Father, from whom all things came and for whom we live; and there is but one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom all things came and through whom we live.

verses.esv: 4 “Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God, the LORD is one.
verses.kjv: 4 Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God is one LORD:
verses.niv: 4 Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God, the LORD is one.

verses.esv:
10   “You are my witnesses,” declares the LORD,
    “and my servant whom I have chosen,
  that you may know and believe me
    and understand that I am he.
  Before me no god was formed,
    nor shall there be any after me.
verses.kjv: 10 Ye are my witnesses, saith the LORD, and my servant whom I have chosen: that ye may know and believe me, and understand that I am he: before me there was no God formed, neither shall there be after me.
verses.niv: 10 "You are my witnesses," declares the LORD, "and my servant whom I have chosen, so that you may know and believe me and understand that I am he. Before me no god was formed, nor will there be one after me.

verses.esv: 29 Jesus answered, “The most important is, ‘Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one.
verses.kjv: 29 And Jesus answered him, The first of all the commandments is, Hear, O Israel; The Lord our God is one Lord:
verses.niv: 29 "The most important one," answered Jesus, "is this: 'Hear, O Israel, the Lord our God, the Lord is one.

verses.esv: 30 I and the Father are one.”
verses.kjv: 30 I and my Father are one.
verses.niv: 30 I and the Father are one."

verses.esv: 8 “I am the Alpha and the Omega,” says the Lord God, “who is and who was and who is to come, the Almighty.”
verses.kjv: 8 I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
verses.niv: 8 "I am the Alpha and the Omega," says the Lord God, "who is, and who was, and who is to come, the Almighty."

verses.esv: 1:1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.kjv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.niv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

verses.kjv: 25 To the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
verses.niv: 1 Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ and a brother of James, To those who have been called, who are loved by God the Father and kept by Jesus Christ:

verses.esv: 3 And this is eternal life, that they know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ whom you have sent.
verses.kjv: 3 And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.
verses.niv: 3 Now this is eternal life: that they may know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom you have sent.

verses.esv: 14 And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, and we have seen his glory, glory as of the only Son from the Father, full of grace and truth.
verses.kjv: 14 And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
verses.niv: 14 The Word became flesh and made his dwelling among us. We have seen his glory, the glory of the One and Only, who came from the Father, full of grace and truth.

verses.esv:
8   I am the LORD; that is my name;
    my glory I give to no other,
    nor my praise to carved idols.
verses.kjv: 8 I am the LORD: that is my name: and my glory will I not give to another, neither my praise to graven images.
verses.niv: 8 "I am the LORD; that is my name! I will not give my glory to another or my praise to idols.

verses.esv:
8   Fear not, nor be afraid;
    have I not told you from of old and declared it?
    And you are my witnesses!
  Is there a God besides me?
    There is no Rock; I know not any.”
verses.kjv: 8 Fear ye not, neither be afraid: have not I told thee from that time, and have declared it? ye are even my witnesses. Is there a God beside me? yea, there is no God; I know not any.
verses.niv: 8 Do not tremble, do not be afraid. Did I not proclaim this and foretell it long ago? You are my witnesses. Is there any God besides me? No, there is no other Rock; I know not one."

verses.esv: 9 For in him the whole fullness of deity dwells bodily,
verses.kjv: 9 For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
verses.niv: 9 For in Christ all the fullness of the Deity lives in bodily form,

verses.esv:
18   For thus says the LORD,
  who created the heavens
    (he is God!),
  who formed the earth and made it
    (he established it;
  he did not create it empty,
    he formed it to be inhabited!):
  “I am the LORD, and there is no other.
verses.kjv: 18 For thus saith the LORD that created the heavens; God himself that formed the earth and made it; he hath established it, he created it not in vain, he formed it to be inhabited: I am the LORD; and there is none else.
verses.niv: 18 For this is what the LORD says- he who created the heavens, he is God; he who fashioned and made the earth, he founded it; he did not create it to be empty, but formed it to be inhabited- he says: "I am the LORD, and there is no other.

verses.esv:
9     remember the former things of old;
  for I am God, and there is no other;
    I am God, and there is none like me,
verses.kjv: 9 Remember the former things of old: for I am God, and there is none else; I am God, and there is none like me,
verses.niv: 9 Remember the former things, those of long ago; I am God, and there is no other; I am God, and there is none like me.

verses.esv:
6   For to us a child is born,
    to us a son is given;
  and the government shall be upon his shoulder,
    and his name shall be called
  Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God,
    Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.
verses.kjv: 6 For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
verses.niv: 6 For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

verses.esv: 35 To you it was shown, that you might know that the LORD is God; there is no other besides him.
verses.kjv: 35 Unto thee it was shewed, that thou mightest know that the LORD he is God; there is none else beside him.
verses.niv: 35 You were shown these things so that you might know that the LORD is God; besides him there is no other.

verses.esv: 16 For by him all things were created, in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or rulers or authorities—all things were created through him and for him.
verses.kjv: 16 For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
verses.niv: 16 For by him all things were created: things in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or powers or rulers or authorities; all things were created by him and for him.

verses.esv: 3 “You shall have no other gods before me.
verses.kjv: 3 Thou shalt have no other gods before me.
verses.niv: 3 "You shall have no other gods before me.

verses.esv: 4 Therefore, as to the eating of food offered to idols, we know that “an idol has no real existence,” and that “there is no God but one.”
verses.kjv: 4 As concerning therefore the eating of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols, we know that an idol is nothing in the world, and that there is none other God but one.
verses.niv: 4 So then, about eating food sacrificed to idols: We know that an idol is nothing at all in the world and that there is no God but one.

verses.esv: 60 that all the peoples of the earth may know that the LORD is God; there is no other.
verses.kjv: 60 That all the people of the earth may know that the LORD is God, and that there is none else.
verses.niv: 60 so that all the peoples of the earth may know that the LORD is God and that there is no other.
